cn.description:
Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best.

ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE.
Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged.

FOR EVERY MUSICIAN.
Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads.

DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE.
AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space.

CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY.
AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there).


Highlighted Features:
- A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design.
- Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting).
- Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions).
- The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. 
- Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live.
- Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase.
- Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral.
- Concert pitch adjustment.


How to Use:
01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement.
02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes.
03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration.

Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

cn.releaseNotes:

本次更新：
- 修正 HAA 订阅价格显示
- 修复 ACU 模块可能的崩溃
- 修复错误并提升稳定性
cn.description:
AudioTools提供了一套专业级音频和声学分析工具，应用价格已包含一系列实用专业工具 -- 包括SPL、RTA、FFT、扬声器极性测试、发生器、音频范围、CLF查看器及录音机，程序设计框架还能根据个人需要增添更多强大模块。

可根据个人需求选购其他模块来定制AudioTools，包括Smaart工具I、SPL曲线图或脉冲响应，可随时从你的iOS设备购买。

我们测试过所有iOS设备，校准了麦克风级别和频率响应以获得最佳结果。我们可以关闭Apple的低频滤波器，并在大多数设备上可测量高达120 dB的声压级。

你还可添加iTestMic、iPrecisionMic或iAudioInterface2获得完整的专业音频和声学测试与测量平台。

真实用户评价:

“...AudioTools是一款“让人相见恨晚”的优秀应用”。

“我想这款应用是我有史以来买过的最好用的。”

“我用过价值几千美金的复杂测试设备，却不敌这款应用套装。”

***** 应用价格包含 *****

* SPL测量仪
经典模拟SPL测量仪，包括A加权和C加权，以及快慢ANSI衰减模式。所有滤波器符合甚至超越ANSI 1型标准。

* RTA
1/3及倍频段实时分析仪。含触控GUI范围控制、指针、最大/最小条、噪音曲线覆盖。 

* FFT
详细声学分析，多达32876点。可查看完整详情或平滑过渡到1/24、1/6、1/3或倍频程。含指针、可扩展图形及峰值追踪。

* 极性
扬声器极性检查器。将测试信号路由到扬声器，在屏幕上读取扬声器极性。

* CLF查看器
显示扬声器数据，包括阻抗绘图、轴响应、灵敏度、极响应、6dB覆盖，以及一个3D彩球绘图。 

* 延迟查找器
测量脉冲从扬声器返回时间。 

* 发生器
生成正弦波、方波、白噪和粉噪。

* 线路电平测试
拥有线路电平测量功能和频率计数器。

* 音频范围
一款双通道音频示波器，包括自动触发、可变增益和扫描率，以及范围图像存储。

* 录音机
一款单声道/立体声音频录音机，具有WAV和压缩格式8k-48k采样率。通过WIFI传输文件。

* 通过WiFi传输结果文件到PC/Mac。

* 音频计算器

***** AudioTools内可选购模块 *****

* Smaart®工具 - 单通道模块。
在移动平台上享受强大的Smaart®功能。包括RTA绘图到1/48倍频程及声谱仪。在iPad上可分屏使用。

* 传输功能 -- 需要双通道接口。 
双通道基于FFT测量。可使用音乐或粉噪作为信号源分析声音系统性能。

* ETC
能量时间曲线。绘制脉冲衰减，计算RT60时间。有内部或外部触发器。

* 脉冲曲线
录制并分析脉冲或正弦扫描，计算倍频程和1/3倍频程ETC、T30、C50、C80、CT、定义，还显示FFT和Schroeder曲线。

* LARSA
快速准确正弦测量扬声器及房间。

* SPL专业版
数字SPL测量仪，拥有ANSI慢、快、峰值、脉冲模式，以及LEQ。包括A加权和C加权，以及所有10个倍频段滤波器。

* SPL曲线图
按秒绘制SPL长达24小时，可选录音。此外，增加可选倍频段记录升级让此工具可匹敌任何专业记录SPL测量仪。

* SPL交通灯
监测实时声压级SPL和leq，并在一个简单的绿黄红显示屏上查看状态。

* STIPA语音清晰度
符合最新NFPA准则标准，用于evac系统测试及学校。

* 扬声器失真
测量任何驱动的THD+n。

* THD+n (需要iAudioInterface)

* 阻抗测量仪和绘图(需要iAudioInterface)

* 相位计

* 振幅扫描

cn.description:
2022年8月19日
最新追加内容「皇座之舞」现已推出！
执念的亡魂再一次被召唤到索拉斯，背负所有德慕格的意志，重新踏上充满血腥的复仇之路。
德慕格的领袖伊琳娜将在本模式中作为可操作角色登场。以快节奏的双刀轮舞，通过截然不同的方式体验索拉斯大陆的挑战。


2020年8月20日
资料片「遗忘之潮」现已发售！
追加新剧情、新场景、新可操作角色。
和杰洛尔德一起，去探索被诅咒的伊西索亚吧！

■ 设备支持：
 
- iOS 9 及以上系统

- iPhone6S 及以上的 iPhone 机型

- 拥有 2G 及以上内存的 iPad 机型


■ 游戏简介

《帕斯卡契约》是一款幻想风格的动作角色扮演游戏，由TIPSWORKS工作室开发，拥有超高品质的画面表现，将带来移动平台前所未有的感官体验。

世界被黑雾笼罩，光明微渺而神秘，人们在其中迷失狂乱……而这一切背后的秘密至今无人知晓。玩家将操作多名角色，体验深邃的故事，探索多样的地图，遭遇超乎想象的敌人，在史诗级的配乐中面对史诗级的BOSS，迎接史诗级的死亡与真相！


■ 游戏特色

- 20小时以上的游戏内容，让人难忘的冒险

- 4名可操作角色，4种特色鲜明的战斗体验 

- 几十种敌人，丰富且有深度的ACT战斗

- 众多NPC和隐藏支线

- 极具探索感的立体地图

- 电影化的演出与叙事，全程语音

- 极富渲染力的配乐，由世界著名交响乐团倾情演奏

- 使用MFi认证手柄游玩，操作体验更佳


■ 故事背景

上古时代，一场天灾导致太阳沉入海底，失去光明的大陆突然被名为“污秽”的黑雾所笼罩。与此同时被后人尊为神明的“巨像”第一次行走于大地之上，散发着星火一般的光，驱散着黑雾也为人类带来了唯一的希望。

千百年之后，人类早已习惯同巨像相伴而行，穿行于黑雾之中苟延残喘。然而一场神秘的瘟疫，导致巨像相继陨落。被教会放逐的先驱者泰伦斯，发现这场瘟疫似乎与多年前离开自己的妻子——特蕾莎，有着某种联系。为了追查瘟疫的源头，同时也为了寻回失踪多年的妻子，泰伦斯开始了一场极尽悲苦的救赎之旅。

■ 官方社群
- 官方QQ群： 820237970
- 微信公众号：帕斯卡契约
- 官方贴吧：帕斯卡契约
- 官方微博：帕斯卡契约
- BiliBili官方账号：帕斯卡契约

cn.releaseNotes:
【v.3.5.8 更新公告】
*推荐各位细胞人使用云存档功能备份存档~避免卸载原安装包后出现存档丢失的情况。
**各位细胞人大佬注意！随着游戏的更新以及资源量的提高，设备的最低运行配置要求会有所提升，推荐使用有可用RAM 4GB 以上的设备来运行本次的新内容哦。

以下为本次更新内容：
-将SDK进行升级
-添加了OAID相关证书
-修复了“后退”按钮触发机制
-主菜单健康公告字样进行扩大

最低设备要求： iOS 12 或更高版本，内存：4GB，RAM：4GB
注意：部分系统在游戏过程中可能出现运行内存报错弹框问题，烦请大佬们备份云存档，尝试重启游戏，再次进入游戏即可正常游玩~
同时在切换设备，或者重装游戏的时候，本地的存档会随着卸载丢失，推荐大家使用云存档功能来进行游戏进度的备份~请注意，云存档的目的是解决换机和数据备份的需求，上传及下载操作不可逆，且均需要手动操作。
cn.description:
死亡并非永眠。

操作炼金实验失败的产物，在杀戮与重生的反复轮回中探索一座房间不断变化的巨大城堡，解开这座阴暗孤岛上的秘密…!
当然，前提是你能战胜镇守其中的诸多守卫。

重生细胞是一款RogueVania类型的平台动作游戏。你需要在一次一次战斗中锤炼战斗技巧，精通拥有独特使用方式的各种武器，并且将翻滚和闪避等走位操作视为本能，以逃过那些出其不意出现的怪潮侵袭，迎战强横凶残的守卫和Boss。

鏖战、死亡、重生、再战

继PC与主机平台之后，《重生细胞》准备在移动平台开启战斗！

【主要特色】
• RogueVania: 逐步攻略经过悉心设计的相连关卡，体验rogue-lite类型的重复可玩性，直面肾上腺素激增的凶险场面。
• 凌厉爽快的2D动作体验：洞悉敌人的出手套路灵活走位，否则你将止步于半途，无缘城堡中隐藏的更多秘密。
• 非线性进程：在反复的死亡中突破难关，根据自己的游玩风格或心情自由选择装备与技能搭配。厌倦了臭气熏天的下水道？攀上城头呼吸新鲜的空气吧！
• 随心所欲的游玩：探索城堡的边边角角和隐秘通道，发现深藏在城堡深处的迷人景观，抑或是直冲终点？一切由你。

【针对移动平台进行的悉心优化】
• 两种攻击模式：传统与移动版新加入的自动攻击系统。
• 定制键位与触屏操作：根据你的喜好调整按钮位置及大小，通过触屏滑动来进行闪避走位…
• MFi设备以及主机控制器蓝牙连接特性支持。

cn.releaseNotes:
Introducing frame and building benchmark examples and extensive improvements throughout the app!

• NEW: Examples gallery in the home screen, including new examples for frames and buildings.  Click on the button with a book icon to open it.

• NEW: The new eyedropper button in the frame editor allows you to copy the material and cross-section from one beam to another.  To use it, select a beam, press the eyedropper button, and then select another beam to copy from.

• FIXED: Cross section stress analysis for angles and zees is now performed along their principal axes rather than geometric axes.

• IMPROVED: Numerous performance, stability, layout, and interaction enhancements in the 2D editor, especially when working with large models.

Thank you for your continued support and feedback!  Reach us at contact@ketchep.com with any questions or comments.
cn.description:
梁的挠度是一个功能强大且多功能的计算器，适用于梁、二维桁架和二维框架。界面简洁直观，图形输出采用最先进技术。除了反力、剪切、弯矩和挠度结果外，梁的挠度还能计算横截面和梁沿线的内部剪切和弯曲应力。

二维框架和桁架编辑器

二维编辑器与梁编辑器无缝集成。绘制任意框架和桁架结构，并使用与梁相同的简单界面应用载荷和约束。您可以直接在二维编辑器中可视化结果，或选择一个梁以获取更多见解。

内部应力

获取内部弯曲和剪切应力图，除了剪切、弯矩和挠度图。可以沿着梁的长度以及横截面的垂直轴线可视化内部应力。

横截面编辑器

编辑内置的横截面。惯性矩和面积值会自动计算并应用到其余的梁计算中。

更多功能

• 内置数据库包含更多数据供您参考和方便使用。
• 可选应用梁自重
• 无限设计文件
• 快速启动模板

联系我们

我们期待您的反馈！如果您有任何问题、疑问或评论，请发送电子邮件至contact@ketchep.com。

cn.description:
宠物对战与银河恶魔城的融合。在可爱的侧视像素世界中收集和训练怪物，并让其为你作战。

【寻找灵魂使魔，成为你最可靠的冒险伙伴】
跟随先人的步伐，成为一个怪物饲养人并拯救怪物避难所。借助收集的怪物组建团队，开展史诗般冒险，解锁不断扩张的世界。在成为终极怪物饲养人的过程中，你将揭开威胁着人类与怪物之间和平的谜团。

【探索银河恶魔城式的世界】
探索银河恶魔城式的世界。借助培养的怪物们各种专属能力，你可以在这个世界上进行探索，拓宽自己视界。砍掉树藤、撞倒墙壁、滑过间隙......在怪物的帮助下，通通不在话下。

【组建你自己的队伍】
从世界各地孵化、收集和训练怪物，组建自己的组合。每个怪物均具备独有技能树，方便定制你自己的队伍。

【战术3V3作战，激情碰撞】
有策略地发出进攻命令，发挥最大效果；集中进攻以创造各种连击，反复出招，找到最佳的连击，从而获得最为稀有的怪兽蛋。

【与其他的饲养员联机匹配战斗】
针锋相对，在线上玩家对战中体验雄壮的战斗，接受技巧与能力的试炼！收集并训练怪物，点满它们的技能树，一路作战，让你的怪物撑到最后！

cn.trackName: 打造世界-经典沙盒建造
cn.description:
《打造世界》结合了策略、方块建造沙盒以及塔防多种元素。游戏中，你不是一个人在战斗，需要带领矮人部落在这个充满危险生物的随机世界里进行探索，安排他们分工合作收集资源，制作需要的物品、武器和盔甲，以及建造城堡，来抵御危险生物的入侵。

【世界探索、沙盒生存】
游戏共有七个不同的世界（游戏本体4个地图+3个dlc地图），每个世界都是随机生成的岛屿，你可以在游戏中自由的改变地形地貌。不同世界有着各自的地理及生物特色，同时也暗藏各类怪物和BOSS。带上大聪明矮人征服各个世界吧！

【资源采集、制作发展】
游戏中挖掘矿藏、捕捉动物、打败敌人、种植农田等等方式获得原料；升级科技树，制作数百种完全不同的物品！要知道除了常规的武器、建筑材料、食物、炼金药水外，你甚至建造一个广大的矿井网，配上升降机和铁路，快速抵达藏有最珍贵金属的矿脉中。如何发展矮人部落，你可要好好思考一下。
对了，必须得告诉你，游戏中存在各种魔法，比如打开传送门，提高矮人运输资源的效率；使用魔法之光照亮黑暗的洞穴吓跑怪物；使用降水或是魔法森林加快树木成长，或者是使用指南针魔法找到隐藏资源，从而帮助加快资源开采，探索世界。

【自由建造、殖民管理】
发展一个部落可没那么容易，你需要安排矮人们的衣食住行，可以直接控制矮人进行挖掘、砍伐、攻击、建造等操作，并在矮人与怪物和BOSS战斗时使用魔法帮助他们。
在游戏刚开始时，你只有1位矮人，随着在这个世界的等级提升，会获得更多的矮人；而随着人数越来越多，部落规模也越来越大的。
部落的发展，建筑是必不可少的，发挥你天马星空的想象吧，无论是建古代宫殿风格、还是想要征服天空的空中住宅、又或者是结合现代科技坚不可摧的堡垒，只要你脑洞够大，创造独属于你的矮人之家！

【即时战略&塔防战斗】
有些怪物会成群结队的来掠夺矮人资源，有些怪物会定期从传送门而来攻打矮人，你需要带领矮人建立攻防系统，在的堡垒周围的路上设满陷阱和导弹塔，抵抗成群结队入侵而来的敌人。

【DLC拓展内容】
丰富的DLC内容拓展既可以带你领略不一样的世界：融合中式风格元素的《龙之神庙》、家园领地保卫战的《孤山世界》、暗黑领主和矮人的终极决战《邪恶之心》，还可以让你在世界探索中增加更多乐趣：女矮人携宠物及新装备登场的《姐妹连》、在神秘的斯芬克斯的沙漠世界探索神庙的《废弃矿山》、充满了植物和古老的魔法的《贪婪洞窟》，召唤英雄战士和法师的《英雄对决》，对抗更加强大的地下深渊头目的《怪物联盟》。

cn.description:
《鬼谷八荒》是一款开放世界的沙盒修仙游戏。结合了修仙体系与山海经文化背景，体验从凡人一步步修行成长为强者的过程，与山海经中各种妖、兽战斗。你是否能坚守本心，与困难做斗争；慎做抉择，把握自己的命运。

【遁入修仙世界，开启逆天人生】
鬼谷八荒, 除了财侣法地，还有诡秘莫测的妖兽，危机重重的秘境，难以逾越的天堑，彩光四射的秘宝，等着被人发现。
你将作为一个炼气期小修士从愚村出发，修炼，变强，危机中九死一生。每一次突破，你都能逆天改命，助你在旅途中披荆斩棘，跨越五大州，睥睨天下，再闯上天元山，向天道一问。
【ai互动生态，给NPC完整的一生】
我们构建了完整的NPC互动生态，他们“生活”在这里，有自己的朋友亲族关系网，自己的人生轨迹，不受玩家的进度限制，除非，你决定出手干涉。
你可兼济天下，携手红颜；你可独善其身，快意恩仇；你亦可逆天而行，与全世界为敌。
和NPC们切磋武艺，传授道心，拜师学艺，收徒授业。和NPC在拍卖场喊价厮杀，结束后拔刀相向或顺手牵羊。你将成为修仙界群像中的一部分，是大放异彩，还是默默修行，皆看你如何选择。
【体验小说桥段，感受奇遇惊喜】
英雄救美？爱人为你争风吃醋？五十年之约？卷入神秘组织的明争暗斗？遗迹遇宝？又惨遭夺宝？
这些都有可能发生在你身上。
除NPC交互之外，这里还有丰富的随机事件以及支线任务，在你的旅途中给予惊喜。它们或许会让你烦恼，喂你刀子，也可能让你化险为夷，甚至破而后立。在一步又一步的选择的过程中，你将谱写只属于你的，独一无二的故事。
【打造最强宗门，攻城略地一统八荒】
我们构建了宗门的经营玩法，身为弟子，长老以及宗主，将会有不同的体验。你可以加入大宗门，从最底层的弟子做起，一步步爬上权力的阶梯。也可以空降落魄的小宗门，力挽狂澜，带领宗门重振雄风。
弟子可以完成宗门任务，在宗门大比中出战，或随同门出征作战，为宗门积累资源，为宗门赢取荣誉，为宗门扩张土地。
长老可以管辖门下弟子，传道授业，分配任务职能，加速宗门成长，在宗门大战中指导弟子大杀四方。
宗主则需要统筹全宗的秩序，制定侵略和防守计划，攻防灵矿等资源点，甚至占领他人宗门，夺取专属逆天改命和秘籍。
一统八荒，只要你有宏图壮志和铁腕手段，不再只是幻想。
【构筑独特流派，挑战妖兽神仙】
闯荡这世界，需要有傍身之技。
心法筑根基，武技/灵技探深浅，身法创机会，绝技造优势，神通定乾坤。不同秘籍有不同的特性。
修仙者还有十二大灵根，对应不同的流派，你可以选择专精一路，或全面发展。十二种灵根都有对应的功法秘籍，排列组合可组成丰富的流派，孰强孰弱，皆由你评断。
城镇琅琊阁，宗门功法阁，秘境，各种任务，甚至路边一个土坑里，都可能发现珍奇秘籍，充满惊喜。
这个世界上还有上百种珍奇妖兽，无数修仙者，鬼怪，仙人供您检验自己的实力。挑战升仙擂台，冲击各大洲参玄榜，以此证明自己的实力。你能否踏破冥山的障碍一路向前？构筑的流派能否经历大浪淘沙的检验？
【法宝器灵炼丹画符，三大神器伴前路】
练好自身本领，也别忘了外力加持。
开局三大神器，每一个都会给你带来一种独一无二的系统。双鱼佩可以复活自己和选中之人，昊天眼可以偷学妖兽技能，洞察更多信息，而炼妖壶则可以让你捕获BOSS成为你的小跟班，替你战斗或派遣寻求宝物。
除了开局神器之外，你也能炼制你自己的法宝，并收服器灵与你一起战斗，此外器灵还会在探索中给予你陪伴，触发专属的奇遇等等。
在这里，你还可以学习炼丹画符，堪舆风水，制作帮助你探索世界，整蛊仇人，战斗杀敌的种种道具。至于如何发挥它们真正的作用，皆看各位道友如何抉择。

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的競賽內容
hk.releaseNotes: - Bug Fix: addresses error when attempting to purchase Orbit Soundpack.
hk.description:
Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best.

ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE.
Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged.

FOR EVERY MUSICIAN.
Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads.

DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE.
AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space.

CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY.
AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there).


Highlighted Features:
- A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design.
- Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting).
- Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions).
- The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. 
- Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live.
- Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase.
- Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral.
- Concert pitch adjustment.


How to Use:
01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement.
02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes.
03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration.

Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

Play local music or stream from a file/media server with LMP. 

Apple TV version included, with support for Emby, Navidrome, Plex, and Jellyfin.

▣ Import via iTunes or folder and play local tracks

LMP was designed from scratch with offline music in mind. You can store music on your device in two forms: iTunes music or audio file. The first would require syncing with iTunes on Windows or Finder on Mac. To import as audio files, simply transfer them to the LMP Music folder on your device via any means. If you choose the latter, you will be able to enjoy additional features, such as editing of metadata via the LMP browser assistant.

▣ Connect to a cloud server and stream music from the server

If you have insufficient storage on your device, you can also store your tracks on a server and stream from the server. File servers using SMB and WebDAV are supported. However, we recommend hosting a media server instead, via Plex, Emby, Navidrome or Subsonic due to faster import speeds. All tracks come together seamlessly, no matter how they are imported, providing a unified experience. You can enable the option in the settings to hide repeated tracks across servers.

▣ Manage playlists with ease

LMP has its own playlist system that allows you to not only add tracks from all sources, but also artists. All tracks belonging to the artist would automatically be added to the playlist everytime you open the app or rescan, even newly added ones. With flexible artist splitting, you will be able to ensure that tracks get allocated to the right artist.

When the AI playlist is enabled, LMP will also be able to generate a playlist for you based on your listening preferences. Usage data is only recorded if this feature is enabled, and all data recorded for this is stored locally, so you do not have to worry about data privacy.

▣ Supports CarPlay & Siri

With support for CarPlay, you can start playing a playlist or control what's playing from your car's CarPlay console. Alternatively, you can also tell Siri to start playing a track or all tracks belonging to a particular artist, or use it to control the playback state of the current track.

▣ Support LRC lyrics

LMP supports both embedded lyrics and .lrc files. Use the LRC or Enhanced LRC format, and the app will be able to autoscroll lyrics as the music plays. If you do not have time to add your own lyrics, you can specify the lyrics API to use, and the app will attempt to fetch lyrics of any track that is playing.

▣ Browser Assistant

Manage local files on the app using the LMP browser assistant, which you can open on your computer's browser. Import new files or move/delete existing files using the Folders tool, edit music metadata using the Metadata tool or even manage your playlists using the playlists tool.

hk.description:
AudioTools from Studio Six Digital is a suite of professional-grade audio and acoustic analysis apps. Included in the price of this app is a great collection of professional tools -- SPL, RTA, FFT, Speaker Polarity Test, Generator, Audio Scope, CLF Viewer, and Recorder, and the framework to add more powerful modules as you need them.

Customize AudioTools for your needs by buying any of the additional optional modules, like Smaart Tools I, SPL Graph, or Impulse Response, at any time right from your iOS device.

We test every iOS device and calibrate the microphone level and frequency response for the best results. We have the ability to turn off the Apple low frequency filters, and on many devices we can measure up to 120 dB SPL.

Add iTestMic, iPrecisionMic, or iAudioInterface2 for a complete professional audio and acoustic test and measurement platform.

Actual reviews:

“...AudioTools is a “how did I ever live without it” app”.

“I think this application is the best I EVER purchased.”

“I have used many thousands of dollars of complicated test equipment that doesn’t measure up to this app suite.”

***** Included in the app price *****

* SPL Meter
A faithful reproduction of a classic analog SPL meter. Includes A and C weighting, and Fast and Slow ANSI decay modes. All filters meet or exceed ANSI type 1.

* RTA
A 1/3 and octave band Real Time Analyzer. Includes touch-GUI range control, a cursor, max/min bars, and noise curve overlays. 

* FFT
Detailed acoustic analysis, up to 32876 points. View full detail or smooth to 1/24, 1/6, 1/3 or octave. Includes cursor, scalable graphics, and peak tracking.

* Polarity
Speaker polarity checker. Route the test signal to a speaker, and read the polarity of the speaker on the screen.

* CLF Viewer
Show loudspeaker data, including plots for impedance, axial response, sensitivity, polar response, and 6dB coverage, and a 3D color balloon plot. 

* Delay Finder
Measures the time it takes for a pulse to return from a speaker. 

* Generator
Generates sine waves, square waves, white and pink noise.

* Line Level Tests
A line level measurement function and frequency counter.

* Audio Scope
A dual-channel audio oscilloscope that includes auto-triggering, variable gain and sweep rate, and storage of scope images.

* Recorder
A mono/stereo audio recorder with WAV and compressed formats and 8k-48k sample rate. Transfer files via WIFI.

* File transfer of results via wifi to PC / Mac.

* Audio Calculators

***** Optional modules available for purchase from within AudioTools *****

* SoundScope VR - FFT-based audio analyzer with VR.
The powerful acoustical analysis module. Includes RTA graphs to 1/48th octave and Spectrograph, and can display VR.

* Transfer Function -- Requires 2-channel interface. 
Two-channel FFT-based measurement. Allows you to analyze sound system performance with music or pink noise as the signal source.

* ETC
Energy Time Curve. Plot decay of an impulse over time, and compute RT60 time. Internal or External trigger.

* Impulse Response
Record and analyze an impulse or sine sweep, compute octave and 1/3 octave ETC, T30, C50, C80, CT, Definition.

* LARSA
Fast and accurate sine-sweep measurement of loudspeakers and rooms.

* SPL Pro
Digital SPL meter with ANSI Slow, Fast, Peak, and Impulse mode, along with LEQ. Includes A and C weighting, and all 10 octave band filters.

* SPL Graph
Plot second-by-second SPL level for up to 24 hours, and optionally record the audio. Also, add the optional Octave Band Logging upgrade to elevate this tool to rival any professional logging SPL Meter.

* SPL Traffic Light
Monitor live sound levels SPL and Leq and see status in a simple green-yellow-red display.

* STIPA Speech Intelligibility
Meets the current NFPA code standards for testing evac systems and schools.

* Speaker Distortion
Measure THD+n of any driver.

* THD+n (requires iAudioInterface)

* Impedance Meter and Plot (requires iAudioInterface)

* Phase Meter

* Amplitude Sweep

hk.description:
"If you've not already played this brilliant, heart-wrenching game, then mobile is as good a place as any to let it completely destroy you." - , 9/10, Pocket Gamer UK

"This War of Mine isn’t exactly “fun,” but it’s definitely a game worth playing." , 9/10, 148apps

"I'm really excited to go home and download 11 bit studios' title on my iPad" , Game Informer

In This War Of Mine you do not play as an elite soldier, rather a group of civilians trying to survive in a besieged city; struggling with lack of food, medicine and constant danger from snipers and hostile scavengers. The game provides an experience of war seen from an entirely new angle. 

The pace of This War of Mine is imposed by the day and night cycle. During the day snipers outside stop you from leaving your refuge, so you need to focus on maintaining your hideout: crafting, trading and taking care of your survivors. At night, take one of your civilians on a mission to scavenge through a set of unique locations for items that will help you stay alive. 

Make life-and-death decisions driven by your conscience. Try to protect everybody from your shelter or sacrifice some of them for longer-term survival. During war, there are no good or bad decisions; there is only survival. The sooner you realize that, the better.

This War of Mine: Anniversary Edition
It's been two years since This War of Mine global release and we're still expanding the experience. This new free DLC, created especially for the Anniversary Edition, adds new characters, new locations to explore, and most importantly - a whole new ending, leading to a different outcome to the game. The dilemma though remains the same – how far will you go, to protect the ones you care about? 

Key Features:
• Inspired by real-life events 
• Control your survivors and manage your shelter 
• Craft weapons, alcohol, beds or stoves – anything that helps you survive 
• Make decisions - an often unforgiving and emotionally difficult experience 
• Randomized world and characters every time you start a new game 
• Charcoal-stylized aesthetics to complement the game's theme

This War of Mine experience is now broadened with "The Little Ones" expansion. "The Little Ones" explores the hardships of wartime survival as seen from an entirely new perspective―that of a child. This DLC puts you in charge of a group of adults and children stuck in a besieged city, struggling with basic necessities. TWoM: The Little Ones focuses not only on the reality of enduring war, but also on how even in times of conflict, kids are still kids: they laugh, cry, play, and see the world differently. In addition to thinking about survival, you'll have to summon your inner child to understand how to protect the little ones. Their youth, and their future, are in your hands.

• Experience the biggest expansion to This War of Mine
• Protect innocent children
• Craft toys, play with kids, and be the caretaker they need
• Meet new adult civilians in scenarios with children

PLEASE NOTE: This game is optimized for latest devices. While playing on older devices such as iPhone 4s or iPad 2 you might experience lower frame rates.

-可摳圖（鋼筆工具、套索工具、塗抹工具和文字工具等自定義形狀摳圖工具）
-快進、倒播視頻，給視頻添加慢動作鏡頭（1/12慢速至16倍速）
- 360度旋轉影片
-多種混合影像模式
-各種字體、文字模版、文字顏色、表情符號、陰影、文字描邊等
-內寘多種風格的免費配樂和音效，可添加電腦上的音樂或者iTunes裏的音樂，還可選取匯出視頻裏的音訊
-給視頻配音錄音
-直接在影片上用手指繪畫塗鴉
-專業視頻比例，可縮放的時間線，無限制的軌道圖層
-簡單自動跟蹤功能
-添加移動式馬賽克
-自定義影片背景顏色
-可調整素材亮度、對比度、飽和度
-創建自己的Gif動畫
-私人定制特效片頭（需另外購買）
-多達幾十種濾鏡特效（素描、漫畫、魚眼、放大鏡、顏色濾鏡等）
-多達幾十種場景切換特效
-可給視頻／照片設定各種外觀如圓形、心形和鑽石等，甚至自定義獨一無二的形狀
-可設定疊加視頻／照片的透明色（Chroma Key），比如去除照片中純色背景色（綠幕藍幕摳像）
-能把視頻／照片變黑白，把需要突出的部分還原色彩突出出來（Color Splash）
-能自由變形視頻／照片成不規則形狀
-給視頻／照片／文字添加運動點，使它們動起來，縮放、旋轉和移動結合起來可創建出各種各樣的絢麗效果
-實时預覽，高分辨視頻輸出
-可通過Wi-Fi直接從電腦導入多媒體素材：視頻、照片、音樂和Gif動畫等
-可直接保存並分享影片到社交網絡，如雲盤、微信、QQ、抖音等

如果您有任何問題或迴響，請直接發郵件到verytools2006@gmail.com，我們會儘快答覆您。謝謝！

hk.trackCensoredName: 鬼谷八荒 Tale of Immortal
hk.trackName: 鬼谷八荒 Tale of Immortal
hk.description:
《鬼谷八荒》是一款開放世界的沙盒修仙遊戲。結合了修仙體系與山海經文化背景，體驗從凡人一步步修行成長為強者的過程，與山海經中各種妖、獸戰鬥。你是否能堅守本心，與困難做鬥爭；慎做抉擇，把握自己的命運。
【遁入修仙世界，開啟逆天人生】  
鬼谷八荒，除了財侶法地，還有詭祕莫測的妖獸，危機重重的秘境，難以逾越的天塹，彩光四射的祕寶，等著被人發現。  
你將作為一個煉氣期小修士從愚村出發，修煉，變強，危機中九死一生。每一次突破，你都能逆天改命，助你在旅途上披荊斬棘，跨越五大州，睥睨天下，再闖上天元山，向天道一問。  

【AI互動生態，給NPC完整的一生】  
我們構建了完整的NPC互動生態，他們「生活」在這裡，有自己的朋友親族關係網，自己的人生軌跡，不受玩家的進度限制，除非，你決定出手干涉。  
你可兼濟天下，攜手紅顏；你可獨善其身，快意恩仇；你亦可逆天而行，與全世界為敵。  
和NPC們切磋武藝，傳授道心，拜師學藝，收徒授業。和NPC在拍賣場喊價廝殺，結束後拔刀相向或順手牽羊。你將成為修仙界群像中的一部分，是大放異彩，還是默默修行，皆看你如何選擇。  

【體驗小說橋段，感受奇遇驚喜】  
英雄救美？愛人為你爭風吃醋？五十年之約？捲入神秘組織的明爭暗鬥？遺蹟遇寶？又慘遭奪寶？  
這些都有可能發生在你身上。  
除NPC交互之外，這裡還有豐富的隨機事件以及支線任務，在你的旅途上給予驚喜。它們或許會讓你煩惱，餵你刀子，也可能讓你化險為夷，甚至破而後立。在一步又一步的選擇過程中，你將譜寫只屬於你的，獨一無二的故事。  

【打造最強宗門，攻城略地一統八荒】  
我們構建了宗門的經營玩法，身為弟子、長老以及宗主，將會有不同的體驗。你可以加入大宗門，從最底層的弟子做起，一步步爬上權力的階梯。也可以空降落魄的小宗門，力挽狂瀾，帶領宗門重振雄風。  
弟子可以完成宗門任務，在宗門大比中出戰，或隨同門出征作戰，為宗門積累資源，為宗門贏取榮譽，為宗門擴張土地。  
長老可以管轄門下弟子，傳道授業，分配任務職能，加速宗門成長，在宗門大戰中指導弟子大殺四方。  
宗主則需要統籌全宗的秩序，制定侵略和防守計劃，攻防靈礦等資源點，甚至佔領他人宗門，奪取專屬逆天改命和祕籍。  
一統八荒，只要你有宏圖壯志和鐵腕手段，不再只是幻想。  

【構築獨特流派，挑戰妖獸神仙】  
闖蕩這世界，需要有傍身之技。  
心法築根基，武技/靈技探深淺，身法創機會，絕技造優勢，神通定乾坤。不同祕籍有不同的特性。  
修仙者還有十二大靈根，對應不同的流派，你可以選擇專精一路，或全面發展。十二種靈根都有對應的功法祕籍，排列組合可組成豐富的流派，孰強孰弱，皆由你評斷。  
城鎮琅琊閣、宗門功法閣、秘境、各種任務，甚至路邊一個土坑裡，都可能發現珍奇祕籍，充滿驚喜。  
這個世界上還有上百種珍奇妖獸，無數修仙者、鬼怪、仙人供你檢驗自己的實力。挑戰升仙擂台，衝擊各大洲參玄榜，以此證明自己的實力。你能否踏破冥山的障礙一路向前？構築的流派能否經歷大浪淘沙的檢驗？  

【法寶器靈煉丹畫符，三大神器伴前路】  
練好自身本領，也別忘了外力加持。  
開局三大神器，每一個都會給你帶來一種獨一無二的系統。雙魚佩可以復活自己和選中之人，昊天眼可以偷學妖獸技能，洞察更多訊息，而煉妖壺則可以讓你捕獲BOSS成為你的小跟班，替你戰鬥或派遣尋求寶物。  
除了開局神器之外，你也能煉製你自己的法寶，並收服器靈與你一起戰鬥，此外器靈還會在探索中給予你陪伴，觸發專屬的奇遇等等。  
在這裡，你還可以學習煉丹畫符、堪輿風水，製作幫助你探索世界、整蠱仇人、戰鬥殺敵的種種道具。至於如何發揮它們真正的作用，皆看各位道友如何抉擇。

- 2.0 core playback UI now supports video chapter markers

hk.description:
Looking for a feature-packed and efficient media player to manage, organize, and play different types of video content? Enter VidHub! As the newest and most popular media player, VidHub serves up more than just the ability to play all types of video formats. With extensive media library management and network sharing functionalities, VidHub promises stable and speedy video playback for an exceptional user experience.

Some of the key features that VidHub offers include:
- Support iOS, Mac, Apple TV platform, data synchronization through iCloud
- Support for a comprehensive range of video formats, including .mkv、.avi、.mp4、.mov、.rmvb、.wmv, and more
- High-quality video playback for HD, 4K, HDR, and various other resolutions
- The ability to enable and disable subtitles, with support for embedded and external subtitle formats such as SRT, SSA, and SUB
- Network sharing capabilities, with support for SMB/CIFS, WebDav, and other protocols, as well as access to cloud-based video files from Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, and Baidu Netdisk, Aliyun disk, 139 drive, 115 netdisk, enabling easy access to video files on remote servers and cloud storage services.
- Support downloading and deleting cloud files
- Support renaming cloud files, support add character, replace character, regular expression renaming method.
- Support direct-link to Emby, Jellyfin, Plex media server.
- Built-in media library management tools, with an intuitive interface for displaying videos and customizable sorting options by type, date, rating, and more.

All in all, VidHub offers a fully-featured and outstanding media player experience, delivering the smoothest and highest-quality viewing experience for all types of video content, with all the customizations and features one could desire.

Note: The metadata and artwork are sourced from TMDB, a movie and TV show database that is maintained by the community.

hk.description:
全球出貨＆下載超過100萬套的
《Trials of Mana》在智慧型手機上登場！

不論過去有沒有遊玩過《聖劍傳說》系列作品，都能夠盡情享受本作品帶來的樂趣。

◆故事
從前，世界仍處在被黑暗所壟罩的時代。瑪那女神以「瑪那之劍」打倒了將世界導向毀滅的8個災厄化身--「神獸」，並將其封印在8個要石之中。
就這樣，黑暗褪去，世界就此誕生了。

瑪那女神化身為大樹陷入了沉睡，並經過了漫長的歲月……
然而卻出現了一群人，企圖從8個要石之中，再度將神獸解放出來，以獲取超越神的力量，並藉此掌握世界。於是，世界上紛爭四起……和平的時代宣告終結……

與此同時，瑪那迅速地從這世上消失，瑪那之樹也開始枯萎衰弱……

◆主角
故事開始時可以從6名角色當中選擇3人。本作採用了獨特的「三線故事」設計。根據選擇的主角與夥伴不同，將會帶來不同的冒險旅程。

◆畫質
以全3D技術呈現出美麗的瑪那世界！ 過去令人懷念的場景與角色們將以漂亮的畫質重現。

◆戰鬥系統
戰鬥系統加入了跳躍、連段攻擊、閃避敵人攻擊等多樣化動作重新打造。本作依然保有《聖劍傳說》系列傳統的「環狀指令」，還另外新增了「快捷鍵指令」。

◆成長系統
「光」或「闇」--透過「轉職」讓角色的類型與外觀產生變化！ 本作新增了4階職業，還以超過300種的「技能」重新調整成長系統，讓養成變得更加自由。

◆難度設定
分為「非常簡單、簡單、普通、困難」4個階段。如果您不擅長動作遊戲，希望以享受劇情為主的話，推薦您選擇即使全滅也能原地復活的「非常簡單」。

◆全新的編曲
本作收錄了多達60首由作曲家菊田裕樹監修的全新編曲！ 也可將音樂切換至原版的音源遊玩。

◆角色語音
由豪華配音陣容帶來的語音體驗！ 隨著隊伍組合不同，冒險中的支線對話也會改變……

◆通關後要素
觀賞完結局後，將會觸發對應各主角的嶄新篇章。在通過嶄新篇章後，便可以「繼承過關資料開始新遊戲」，還能選擇挑戰「非常困難」與極度難以通關的「沒有未來」難度。

◆其他嶄新要素
新增了可以遊玩各主角故事開端的「序章體驗」，以及《聖劍傳說》系列中大家熟悉的「仙人掌小弟」探索，還大幅更新了「種子」的種類。另外，本遊戲也支援自動儲存功能。

◆智慧型手機版本的特徵
‧翻修為便於觸控使用的選單，能夠以虛擬面板操控角色。
‧新增自動鎖定目標、自動調整鏡頭、自動戰鬥等功能。
‧可以在選項中自行選擇喜歡的畫質。
‧支援雲端儲存。
‧能夠獲得兩件初始裝備，裝備時直到Lv17都會發揮特殊效果，它們分別是增加戰鬥所獲經驗值的「拉比兔飾品」，以及增加戰鬥所獲盧克的「絲尾拉比兔飾品」。

【應用程式大小】
‧本應用程式的大小約為6.7GB。購買前請先確認裝置可用的儲存空間。
‧啟動應用程式後，於通過最初的BOSS戰後將需要下載大量資料。也可以一開始就用標題畫面的「下載」全部下載。
‧強烈建議使用Wi-Fi下載。

【遊玩人數】
1人

mo.description:
Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best.

ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE.
Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged.

FOR EVERY MUSICIAN.
Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads.

DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE.
AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space.

CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY.
AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there).


Highlighted Features:
- A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design.
- Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting).
- Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions).
- The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. 
- Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live.
- Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase.
- Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral.
- Concert pitch adjustment.


How to Use:
01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement.
02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes.
03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration.

Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

任務簡報

在1941年東部戰線的刺骨嚴寒中戰鬥！
指揮坦克和步兵 攻克敵陣！

- 激動人心的戰役和充滿挑戰的任務

Play local music or stream from a file/media server with LMP. 

Apple TV version included, with support for Emby, Navidrome, Plex, and Jellyfin.

▣ Import via iTunes or folder and play local tracks

LMP was designed from scratch with offline music in mind. You can store music on your device in two forms: iTunes music or audio file. The first would require syncing with iTunes on Windows or Finder on Mac. To import as audio files, simply transfer them to the LMP Music folder on your device via any means. If you choose the latter, you will be able to enjoy additional features, such as editing of metadata via the LMP browser assistant.

▣ Connect to a cloud server and stream music from the server

If you have insufficient storage on your device, you can also store your tracks on a server and stream from the server. File servers using SMB and WebDAV are supported. However, we recommend hosting a media server instead, via Plex, Emby, Navidrome or Subsonic due to faster import speeds. All tracks come together seamlessly, no matter how they are imported, providing a unified experience. You can enable the option in the settings to hide repeated tracks across servers.

▣ Manage playlists with ease

LMP has its own playlist system that allows you to not only add tracks from all sources, but also artists. All tracks belonging to the artist would automatically be added to the playlist everytime you open the app or rescan, even newly added ones. With flexible artist splitting, you will be able to ensure that tracks get allocated to the right artist.

When the AI playlist is enabled, LMP will also be able to generate a playlist for you based on your listening preferences. Usage data is only recorded if this feature is enabled, and all data recorded for this is stored locally, so you do not have to worry about data privacy.

▣ Supports CarPlay & Siri

With support for CarPlay, you can start playing a playlist or control what's playing from your car's CarPlay console. Alternatively, you can also tell Siri to start playing a track or all tracks belonging to a particular artist, or use it to control the playback state of the current track.

▣ Support LRC lyrics

LMP supports both embedded lyrics and .lrc files. Use the LRC or Enhanced LRC format, and the app will be able to autoscroll lyrics as the music plays. If you do not have time to add your own lyrics, you can specify the lyrics API to use, and the app will attempt to fetch lyrics of any track that is playing.

▣ Browser Assistant

Manage local files on the app using the LMP browser assistant, which you can open on your computer's browser. Import new files or move/delete existing files using the Folders tool, edit music metadata using the Metadata tool or even manage your playlists using the playlists tool.

mo.description:
AudioTools from Studio Six Digital is a suite of professional-grade audio and acoustic analysis apps. Included in the price of this app is a great collection of professional tools -- SPL, RTA, FFT, Speaker Polarity Test, Generator, Audio Scope, CLF Viewer, and Recorder, and the framework to add more powerful modules as you need them.

Customize AudioTools for your needs by buying any of the additional optional modules, like Smaart Tools I, SPL Graph, or Impulse Response, at any time right from your iOS device.

We test every iOS device and calibrate the microphone level and frequency response for the best results. We have the ability to turn off the Apple low frequency filters, and on many devices we can measure up to 120 dB SPL.

Add iTestMic, iPrecisionMic, or iAudioInterface2 for a complete professional audio and acoustic test and measurement platform.

Actual reviews:

“...AudioTools is a “how did I ever live without it” app”.

“I think this application is the best I EVER purchased.”

“I have used many thousands of dollars of complicated test equipment that doesn’t measure up to this app suite.”

***** Included in the app price *****

* SPL Meter
A faithful reproduction of a classic analog SPL meter. Includes A and C weighting, and Fast and Slow ANSI decay modes. All filters meet or exceed ANSI type 1.

* RTA
A 1/3 and octave band Real Time Analyzer. Includes touch-GUI range control, a cursor, max/min bars, and noise curve overlays. 

* FFT
Detailed acoustic analysis, up to 32876 points. View full detail or smooth to 1/24, 1/6, 1/3 or octave. Includes cursor, scalable graphics, and peak tracking.

* Polarity
Speaker polarity checker. Route the test signal to a speaker, and read the polarity of the speaker on the screen.

* CLF Viewer
Show loudspeaker data, including plots for impedance, axial response, sensitivity, polar response, and 6dB coverage, and a 3D color balloon plot. 

* Delay Finder
Measures the time it takes for a pulse to return from a speaker. 

* Generator
Generates sine waves, square waves, white and pink noise.

* Line Level Tests
A line level measurement function and frequency counter.

* Audio Scope
A dual-channel audio oscilloscope that includes auto-triggering, variable gain and sweep rate, and storage of scope images.

* Recorder
A mono/stereo audio recorder with WAV and compressed formats and 8k-48k sample rate. Transfer files via WIFI.

* File transfer of results via wifi to PC / Mac.

* Audio Calculators

***** Optional modules available for purchase from within AudioTools *****

* SoundScope VR - FFT-based audio analyzer with VR.
The powerful acoustical analysis module. Includes RTA graphs to 1/48th octave and Spectrograph, and can display VR.

* Transfer Function -- Requires 2-channel interface. 
Two-channel FFT-based measurement. Allows you to analyze sound system performance with music or pink noise as the signal source.

* ETC
Energy Time Curve. Plot decay of an impulse over time, and compute RT60 time. Internal or External trigger.

* Impulse Response
Record and analyze an impulse or sine sweep, compute octave and 1/3 octave ETC, T30, C50, C80, CT, Definition.

* LARSA
Fast and accurate sine-sweep measurement of loudspeakers and rooms.

* SPL Pro
Digital SPL meter with ANSI Slow, Fast, Peak, and Impulse mode, along with LEQ. Includes A and C weighting, and all 10 octave band filters.

* SPL Graph
Plot second-by-second SPL level for up to 24 hours, and optionally record the audio. Also, add the optional Octave Band Logging upgrade to elevate this tool to rival any professional logging SPL Meter.

* SPL Traffic Light
Monitor live sound levels SPL and Leq and see status in a simple green-yellow-red display.

* STIPA Speech Intelligibility
Meets the current NFPA code standards for testing evac systems and schools.

* Speaker Distortion
Measure THD+n of any driver.

* THD+n (requires iAudioInterface)

* Impedance Meter and Plot (requires iAudioInterface)

* Phase Meter

* Amplitude Sweep

mo.description:
"If you've not already played this brilliant, heart-wrenching game, then mobile is as good a place as any to let it completely destroy you." - , 9/10, Pocket Gamer UK

"This War of Mine isn’t exactly “fun,” but it’s definitely a game worth playing." , 9/10, 148apps

"I'm really excited to go home and download 11 bit studios' title on my iPad" , Game Informer

In This War Of Mine you do not play as an elite soldier, rather a group of civilians trying to survive in a besieged city; struggling with lack of food, medicine and constant danger from snipers and hostile scavengers. The game provides an experience of war seen from an entirely new angle. 

The pace of This War of Mine is imposed by the day and night cycle. During the day snipers outside stop you from leaving your refuge, so you need to focus on maintaining your hideout: crafting, trading and taking care of your survivors. At night, take one of your civilians on a mission to scavenge through a set of unique locations for items that will help you stay alive. 

Make life-and-death decisions driven by your conscience. Try to protect everybody from your shelter or sacrifice some of them for longer-term survival. During war, there are no good or bad decisions; there is only survival. The sooner you realize that, the better.

This War of Mine: Anniversary Edition
It's been two years since This War of Mine global release and we're still expanding the experience. This new free DLC, created especially for the Anniversary Edition, adds new characters, new locations to explore, and most importantly - a whole new ending, leading to a different outcome to the game. The dilemma though remains the same – how far will you go, to protect the ones you care about? 

Key Features:
• Inspired by real-life events 
• Control your survivors and manage your shelter 
• Craft weapons, alcohol, beds or stoves – anything that helps you survive 
• Make decisions - an often unforgiving and emotionally difficult experience 
• Randomized world and characters every time you start a new game 
• Charcoal-stylized aesthetics to complement the game's theme

This War of Mine experience is now broadened with "The Little Ones" expansion. "The Little Ones" explores the hardships of wartime survival as seen from an entirely new perspective―that of a child. This DLC puts you in charge of a group of adults and children stuck in a besieged city, struggling with basic necessities. TWoM: The Little Ones focuses not only on the reality of enduring war, but also on how even in times of conflict, kids are still kids: they laugh, cry, play, and see the world differently. In addition to thinking about survival, you'll have to summon your inner child to understand how to protect the little ones. Their youth, and their future, are in your hands.

• Experience the biggest expansion to This War of Mine
• Protect innocent children
• Craft toys, play with kids, and be the caretaker they need
• Meet new adult civilians in scenarios with children

PLEASE NOTE: This game is optimized for latest devices. While playing on older devices such as iPhone 4s or iPad 2 you might experience lower frame rates.

二維框架和桁架編輯器

二維編輯器與梁編輯器無縫整合。繪製任意框架和桁架結構，並使用與梁相同的簡單介面來應用荷載和約束。您可以直接在二維編輯器中視覺化結果，或選擇一個梁以獲得更多洞見。

內部應力

除了剪力、彎矩和撓度圖之外，還可以獲得內部彎曲應力和剪力的圖表。可以沿著梁的長度以及截面的垂直軸線可視化內部應力。

截面編輯器

編輯內置截面。轉動慣量和面積值會自動計算並應用於其餘的梁計算。

-添加各種蒙版（線性蒙版、矩形蒙版、圓形蒙版、文字蒙版和路徑蒙版）來隱藏或者顯示影片的各個部分
-可摳圖（鋼筆工具、套索工具、塗抹工具和文字工具等自定義形狀摳圖工具）
-快進、倒播視頻，給視頻添加慢動作鏡頭（1/12慢速至16倍速）
- 360度旋轉影片
-多種混合影像模式
-各種字體、文字模版、文字顏色、表情符號、陰影、文字描邊等
-內寘多種風格的免費配樂和音效，可添加電腦上的音樂或者iTunes裏的音樂，還可選取匯出視頻裏的音訊
-給視頻配音錄音
-直接在影片上用手指繪畫塗鴉
-專業視頻比例，可縮放的時間線，無限制的軌道圖層
-簡單自動跟蹤功能
-添加移動式馬賽克
-自定義影片背景顏色
-可調整素材亮度、對比度、飽和度
-創建自己的Gif動畫
-私人定制特效片頭（需另外購買）
-多達幾十種濾鏡特效（素描、漫畫、魚眼、放大鏡、顏色濾鏡等）
-多達幾十種場景切換特效
-可給視頻／照片設定各種外觀如圓形、心形和鑽石等，甚至自定義獨一無二的形狀
-可設定疊加視頻／照片的透明色（Chroma Key），比如去除照片中純色背景色（綠幕藍幕摳像）
-能把視頻／照片變黑白，把需要突出的部分還原色彩突出出來（Color Splash）
-能自由變形視頻／照片成不規則形狀
-給視頻／照片／文字添加運動點，使它們動起來，縮放、旋轉和移動結合起來可創建出各種各樣的絢麗效果
-實时預覽，高分辨視頻輸出
-可通過Wi-Fi直接從電腦導入多媒體素材：視頻、照片、音樂和Gif動畫等
-可直接保存並分享影片到社交網絡，如雲盤、微信、QQ、抖音等

如果您有任何問題或迴響，請直接發郵件到verytools2006@gmail.com，我們會儘快答覆您。謝謝！

mo.trackName: 鬼谷八荒 Tale of Immortal
mo.description:
《鬼谷八荒》是一款開放世界的沙盒修仙遊戲。結合了修仙體系與山海經文化背景，體驗從凡人一步步修行成長為強者的過程，與山海經中各種妖、獸戰鬥。你是否能堅守本心，與困難做鬥爭；慎做抉擇，把握自己的命運。
【遁入修仙世界，開啟逆天人生】  
鬼谷八荒，除了財侶法地，還有詭祕莫測的妖獸，危機重重的秘境，難以逾越的天塹，彩光四射的祕寶，等著被人發現。  
你將作為一個煉氣期小修士從愚村出發，修煉，變強，危機中九死一生。每一次突破，你都能逆天改命，助你在旅途上披荊斬棘，跨越五大州，睥睨天下，再闖上天元山，向天道一問。  

【AI互動生態，給NPC完整的一生】  
我們構建了完整的NPC互動生態，他們「生活」在這裡，有自己的朋友親族關係網，自己的人生軌跡，不受玩家的進度限制，除非，你決定出手干涉。  
你可兼濟天下，攜手紅顏；你可獨善其身，快意恩仇；你亦可逆天而行，與全世界為敵。  
和NPC們切磋武藝，傳授道心，拜師學藝，收徒授業。和NPC在拍賣場喊價廝殺，結束後拔刀相向或順手牽羊。你將成為修仙界群像中的一部分，是大放異彩，還是默默修行，皆看你如何選擇。  

【體驗小說橋段，感受奇遇驚喜】  
英雄救美？愛人為你爭風吃醋？五十年之約？捲入神秘組織的明爭暗鬥？遺蹟遇寶？又慘遭奪寶？  
這些都有可能發生在你身上。  
除NPC交互之外，這裡還有豐富的隨機事件以及支線任務，在你的旅途上給予驚喜。它們或許會讓你煩惱，餵你刀子，也可能讓你化險為夷，甚至破而後立。在一步又一步的選擇過程中，你將譜寫只屬於你的，獨一無二的故事。  

【打造最強宗門，攻城略地一統八荒】  
我們構建了宗門的經營玩法，身為弟子、長老以及宗主，將會有不同的體驗。你可以加入大宗門，從最底層的弟子做起，一步步爬上權力的階梯。也可以空降落魄的小宗門，力挽狂瀾，帶領宗門重振雄風。  
弟子可以完成宗門任務，在宗門大比中出戰，或隨同門出征作戰，為宗門積累資源，為宗門贏取榮譽，為宗門擴張土地。  
長老可以管轄門下弟子，傳道授業，分配任務職能，加速宗門成長，在宗門大戰中指導弟子大殺四方。  
宗主則需要統籌全宗的秩序，制定侵略和防守計劃，攻防靈礦等資源點，甚至佔領他人宗門，奪取專屬逆天改命和祕籍。  
一統八荒，只要你有宏圖壯志和鐵腕手段，不再只是幻想。  

【構築獨特流派，挑戰妖獸神仙】  
闖蕩這世界，需要有傍身之技。  
心法築根基，武技/靈技探深淺，身法創機會，絕技造優勢，神通定乾坤。不同祕籍有不同的特性。  
修仙者還有十二大靈根，對應不同的流派，你可以選擇專精一路，或全面發展。十二種靈根都有對應的功法祕籍，排列組合可組成豐富的流派，孰強孰弱，皆由你評斷。  
城鎮琅琊閣、宗門功法閣、秘境、各種任務，甚至路邊一個土坑裡，都可能發現珍奇祕籍，充滿驚喜。  
這個世界上還有上百種珍奇妖獸，無數修仙者、鬼怪、仙人供你檢驗自己的實力。挑戰升仙擂台，衝擊各大洲參玄榜，以此證明自己的實力。你能否踏破冥山的障礙一路向前？構築的流派能否經歷大浪淘沙的檢驗？  

【法寶器靈煉丹畫符，三大神器伴前路】  
練好自身本領，也別忘了外力加持。  
開局三大神器，每一個都會給你帶來一種獨一無二的系統。雙魚佩可以復活自己和選中之人，昊天眼可以偷學妖獸技能，洞察更多訊息，而煉妖壺則可以讓你捕獲BOSS成為你的小跟班，替你戰鬥或派遣尋求寶物。  
除了開局神器之外，你也能煉製你自己的法寶，並收服器靈與你一起戰鬥，此外器靈還會在探索中給予你陪伴，觸發專屬的奇遇等等。  
在這裡，你還可以學習煉丹畫符、堪輿風水，製作幫助你探索世界、整蠱仇人、戰鬥殺敵的種種道具。至於如何發揮它們真正的作用，皆看各位道友如何抉擇。

mo.description:
全球出貨＆下載超過100萬套的
《Trials of Mana》在智慧型手機上登場！

不論過去有沒有遊玩過《聖劍傳說》系列作品，都能夠盡情享受本作品帶來的樂趣。

◆故事
從前，世界仍處在被黑暗所壟罩的時代。瑪那女神以「瑪那之劍」打倒了將世界導向毀滅的8個災厄化身--「神獸」，並將其封印在8個要石之中。
就這樣，黑暗褪去，世界就此誕生了。

瑪那女神化身為大樹陷入了沉睡，並經過了漫長的歲月……
然而卻出現了一群人，企圖從8個要石之中，再度將神獸解放出來，以獲取超越神的力量，並藉此掌握世界。於是，世界上紛爭四起……和平的時代宣告終結……

與此同時，瑪那迅速地從這世上消失，瑪那之樹也開始枯萎衰弱……

◆主角
故事開始時可以從6名角色當中選擇3人。本作採用了獨特的「三線故事」設計。根據選擇的主角與夥伴不同，將會帶來不同的冒險旅程。

◆畫質
以全3D技術呈現出美麗的瑪那世界！ 過去令人懷念的場景與角色們將以漂亮的畫質重現。

◆戰鬥系統
戰鬥系統加入了跳躍、連段攻擊、閃避敵人攻擊等多樣化動作重新打造。本作依然保有《聖劍傳說》系列傳統的「環狀指令」，還另外新增了「快捷鍵指令」。

◆成長系統
「光」或「闇」--透過「轉職」讓角色的類型與外觀產生變化！ 本作新增了4階職業，還以超過300種的「技能」重新調整成長系統，讓養成變得更加自由。

◆難度設定
分為「非常簡單、簡單、普通、困難」4個階段。如果您不擅長動作遊戲，希望以享受劇情為主的話，推薦您選擇即使全滅也能原地復活的「非常簡單」。

◆全新的編曲
本作收錄了多達60首由作曲家菊田裕樹監修的全新編曲！ 也可將音樂切換至原版的音源遊玩。

◆角色語音
由豪華配音陣容帶來的語音體驗！ 隨著隊伍組合不同，冒險中的支線對話也會改變……

◆通關後要素
觀賞完結局後，將會觸發對應各主角的嶄新篇章。在通過嶄新篇章後，便可以「繼承過關資料開始新遊戲」，還能選擇挑戰「非常困難」與極度難以通關的「沒有未來」難度。

◆其他嶄新要素
新增了可以遊玩各主角故事開端的「序章體驗」，以及《聖劍傳說》系列中大家熟悉的「仙人掌小弟」探索，還大幅更新了「種子」的種類。另外，本遊戲也支援自動儲存功能。

◆智慧型手機版本的特徵
‧翻修為便於觸控使用的選單，能夠以虛擬面板操控角色。
‧新增自動鎖定目標、自動調整鏡頭、自動戰鬥等功能。
‧可以在選項中自行選擇喜歡的畫質。
‧支援雲端儲存。
‧能夠獲得兩件初始裝備，裝備時直到Lv17都會發揮特殊效果，它們分別是增加戰鬥所獲經驗值的「拉比兔飾品」，以及增加戰鬥所獲盧克的「絲尾拉比兔飾品」。

【應用程式大小】
‧本應用程式的大小約為6.7GB。購買前請先確認裝置可用的儲存空間。
‧啟動應用程式後，於通過最初的BOSS戰後將需要下載大量資料。也可以一開始就用標題畫面的「下載」全部下載。
‧強烈建議使用Wi-Fi下載。

【遊玩人數】
1人

tw.description:
Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best.

ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE.
Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged.

FOR EVERY MUSICIAN.
Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads.

DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE.
AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space.

CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY.
AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there).


Highlighted Features:
- A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design.
- Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting).
- Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions).
- The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. 
- Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live.
- Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase.
- Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral.
- Concert pitch adjustment.


How to Use:
01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement.
02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes.
03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration.

Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

tw.description:
在期盼已久的 「  Clouds & Sheep 」遊戲續集中，可愛的羊羣終於再次得以解放！完成無數任務，滿足綿羊朋友的需求。種植花草樹木並剪不同顏色的羊毛來採購資源！收集快樂星星，收割木材和花瓣，並用它們來爲羊羣提供食物、飾品、玩具和其他東西！控制雲朵，及時降雨，確保綿羊永遠都不會缺飲用水。如果你的綿羊感到高興且滿足，牠們就會生下小羔羊！

每只動物都需要你的關注！這些滾圓的綿羊喜歡休閒娛樂！讓你的綿羊跳躍起來，並使用蹦牀、蹺蹺板和鞦韆主動和牠們一起玩耍！旁觀你的寵物們互相交流，給牠們一些物品，然後觀察牠們的反應！使用有趣的物品自定義你的羊羣牧場，並從狂野西域和海盜領域等不同設定中進行選擇。旁觀你的羊羣白天不知疲憊地奔跑，而到了晚上就依着溫暖的篝火而眠。儘可能讓綿羊保持心情愉快、身體健康，防牠們變成天空中綿狀的大雲朵。

特色：
- 去除廣告！
- 一流遊戲「  Clouds & Sheep 」的精彩續集
- 踏上史詩般的探險之路，找到傳奇般的青春泉水！
- 擁有可愛綿羊的模擬遊戲
- 照顧好羊羣
- 飼養甜美的小羔羊
- 積極和羊羣玩耍
- 給牠們提供許多不同的物品
- 種植並收割不同的資源
- 剪羊毛
- 自定義農場
- 控制天氣
- 日夜循環
- 3D 世界中的開放式遊戲設定
- 適合兒童，但全家人一起玩也非常有趣
- 支持MFi遊戲手柄
- 支持Game Center

Play local music or stream from a file/media server with LMP. 

Apple TV version included, with support for Emby, Navidrome, Plex, and Jellyfin.

▣ Import via iTunes or folder and play local tracks

LMP was designed from scratch with offline music in mind. You can store music on your device in two forms: iTunes music or audio file. The first would require syncing with iTunes on Windows or Finder on Mac. To import as audio files, simply transfer them to the LMP Music folder on your device via any means. If you choose the latter, you will be able to enjoy additional features, such as editing of metadata via the LMP browser assistant.

▣ Connect to a cloud server and stream music from the server

If you have insufficient storage on your device, you can also store your tracks on a server and stream from the server. File servers using SMB and WebDAV are supported. However, we recommend hosting a media server instead, via Plex, Emby, Navidrome or Subsonic due to faster import speeds. All tracks come together seamlessly, no matter how they are imported, providing a unified experience. You can enable the option in the settings to hide repeated tracks across servers.

▣ Manage playlists with ease

LMP has its own playlist system that allows you to not only add tracks from all sources, but also artists. All tracks belonging to the artist would automatically be added to the playlist everytime you open the app or rescan, even newly added ones. With flexible artist splitting, you will be able to ensure that tracks get allocated to the right artist.

When the AI playlist is enabled, LMP will also be able to generate a playlist for you based on your listening preferences. Usage data is only recorded if this feature is enabled, and all data recorded for this is stored locally, so you do not have to worry about data privacy.

▣ Supports CarPlay & Siri

With support for CarPlay, you can start playing a playlist or control what's playing from your car's CarPlay console. Alternatively, you can also tell Siri to start playing a track or all tracks belonging to a particular artist, or use it to control the playback state of the current track.

▣ Support LRC lyrics

LMP supports both embedded lyrics and .lrc files. Use the LRC or Enhanced LRC format, and the app will be able to autoscroll lyrics as the music plays. If you do not have time to add your own lyrics, you can specify the lyrics API to use, and the app will attempt to fetch lyrics of any track that is playing.

▣ Browser Assistant

Manage local files on the app using the LMP browser assistant, which you can open on your computer's browser. Import new files or move/delete existing files using the Folders tool, edit music metadata using the Metadata tool or even manage your playlists using the playlists tool.

tw.description:
AudioTools from Studio Six Digital is a suite of professional-grade audio and acoustic analysis apps. Included in the price of this app is a great collection of professional tools -- SPL, RTA, FFT, Speaker Polarity Test, Generator, Audio Scope, CLF Viewer, and Recorder, and the framework to add more powerful modules as you need them.

Customize AudioTools for your needs by buying any of the additional optional modules, like Smaart Tools I, SPL Graph, or Impulse Response, at any time right from your iOS device.

We test every iOS device and calibrate the microphone level and frequency response for the best results. We have the ability to turn off the Apple low frequency filters, and on many devices we can measure up to 120 dB SPL.

Add iTestMic, iPrecisionMic, or iAudioInterface2 for a complete professional audio and acoustic test and measurement platform.

Actual reviews:

“...AudioTools is a “how did I ever live without it” app”.

“I think this application is the best I EVER purchased.”

“I have used many thousands of dollars of complicated test equipment that doesn’t measure up to this app suite.”

***** Included in the app price *****

* SPL Meter
A faithful reproduction of a classic analog SPL meter. Includes A and C weighting, and Fast and Slow ANSI decay modes. All filters meet or exceed ANSI type 1.

* RTA
A 1/3 and octave band Real Time Analyzer. Includes touch-GUI range control, a cursor, max/min bars, and noise curve overlays. 

* FFT
Detailed acoustic analysis, up to 32876 points. View full detail or smooth to 1/24, 1/6, 1/3 or octave. Includes cursor, scalable graphics, and peak tracking.

* Polarity
Speaker polarity checker. Route the test signal to a speaker, and read the polarity of the speaker on the screen.

* CLF Viewer
Show loudspeaker data, including plots for impedance, axial response, sensitivity, polar response, and 6dB coverage, and a 3D color balloon plot. 

* Delay Finder
Measures the time it takes for a pulse to return from a speaker. 

* Generator
Generates sine waves, square waves, white and pink noise.

* Line Level Tests
A line level measurement function and frequency counter.

* Audio Scope
A dual-channel audio oscilloscope that includes auto-triggering, variable gain and sweep rate, and storage of scope images.

* Recorder
A mono/stereo audio recorder with WAV and compressed formats and 8k-48k sample rate. Transfer files via WIFI.

* File transfer of results via wifi to PC / Mac.

* Audio Calculators

***** Optional modules available for purchase from within AudioTools *****

* SoundScope VR - FFT-based audio analyzer with VR.
The powerful acoustical analysis module. Includes RTA graphs to 1/48th octave and Spectrograph, and can display VR.

* Transfer Function -- Requires 2-channel interface. 
Two-channel FFT-based measurement. Allows you to analyze sound system performance with music or pink noise as the signal source.

* ETC
Energy Time Curve. Plot decay of an impulse over time, and compute RT60 time. Internal or External trigger.

* Impulse Response
Record and analyze an impulse or sine sweep, compute octave and 1/3 octave ETC, T30, C50, C80, CT, Definition.

* LARSA
Fast and accurate sine-sweep measurement of loudspeakers and rooms.

* SPL Pro
Digital SPL meter with ANSI Slow, Fast, Peak, and Impulse mode, along with LEQ. Includes A and C weighting, and all 10 octave band filters.

* SPL Graph
Plot second-by-second SPL level for up to 24 hours, and optionally record the audio. Also, add the optional Octave Band Logging upgrade to elevate this tool to rival any professional logging SPL Meter.

* SPL Traffic Light
Monitor live sound levels SPL and Leq and see status in a simple green-yellow-red display.

* STIPA Speech Intelligibility
Meets the current NFPA code standards for testing evac systems and schools.

* Speaker Distortion
Measure THD+n of any driver.

* THD+n (requires iAudioInterface)

* Impedance Meter and Plot (requires iAudioInterface)

* Phase Meter

* Amplitude Sweep

tw.description:
您是否對相同的舊小說感到厭倦？您是否對交互式故事遊戲、視覺小說、聊天類社交遊戲和獨立遊戲感興趣，但是您已經厭倦了相同的舊遊戲？如果是這樣，您應該查看《七天》，一部視覺小說、決策性的神秘遊戲。

《七天》是一部了不起的神秘視覺小說故事類遊戲。這是一個獨特、決策類的講故事遊戲，而用戶可以根據自己的選擇創建自己的獨特故事。

通過聊天風格的視覺小說類游戲，我們將提供最佳的故事遊戲體驗和豐富的神秘故事情節，專門適用於移動設備。這是一款給您強烈推薦的遊戲。


■ 詳細講解遊戲
您做出的每一個選擇都會改變您的故事。
每個小小的選擇都會改變您與同志們的關係，
並在關鍵時刻改變您和同志們的命運。

您可以是反派，或一位可信賴的同志。
一切都取決於您的選擇。

■ 概要
有的死靈在死亡世界中經受了復活的考驗。
死亡使者給他們分配了一項任務，而他們必須互相攻擊或共同合作。您的角色，基雷爾也必須完成分配給她的選擇性任務。
但是她的任務需要其他人去死......

您只有七天
您會做出什麼樣的選擇？

立即體驗這個發人深省的故事。

■ 遊戲特色
- 圖形新穎的小說類藝術品，具有驚人的圖形
- 在生與死之間切換的獨特遊戲設置
- 根據您的選擇而變化的故事情節
- 各種成就和隱藏的挑戰
- 根據故事的不同情節和結局
- 具有神秘感的文字冒險
- 精彩的講故事遊戲

■ 推薦給那些誰：
- 對文字 / 互動內容感興趣，例如視覺小說、故事遊戲、聊天遊戲和社交遊戲
-對獨特的獨立遊戲充滿熱情，例如《傳說之下》
- 正在尋找帶有神秘和 / 或恐怖元素的講故事遊戲
- 正在尋找終極遊戲，因為他們厭倦了平常的故事類遊戲
- 對其他類型的冒險遊戲感興趣
- 我們還推薦《黑暗界辦公室：鬼怪遊戲》，這是我們的又一款出色的遊戲。

■ 我們保證它會很有趣。立即下載並體驗

如果您發現任何問題或有好的建議，請將它們發送至help@buffstudio.com。我們將努力製作出更好的視覺小說、故事、療愈、獨立，講故事、冒險類遊戲。

■ 我們需要您的支持，以製作更好的故事遊類戲。請將此故事遊戲推薦給您的家人和朋友。這將對我們有很大的幫助。

tw.description:
"If you've not already played this brilliant, heart-wrenching game, then mobile is as good a place as any to let it completely destroy you." - , 9/10, Pocket Gamer UK

"This War of Mine isn’t exactly “fun,” but it’s definitely a game worth playing." , 9/10, 148apps

"I'm really excited to go home and download 11 bit studios' title on my iPad" , Game Informer

In This War Of Mine you do not play as an elite soldier, rather a group of civilians trying to survive in a besieged city; struggling with lack of food, medicine and constant danger from snipers and hostile scavengers. The game provides an experience of war seen from an entirely new angle. 

The pace of This War of Mine is imposed by the day and night cycle. During the day snipers outside stop you from leaving your refuge, so you need to focus on maintaining your hideout: crafting, trading and taking care of your survivors. At night, take one of your civilians on a mission to scavenge through a set of unique locations for items that will help you stay alive. 

Make life-and-death decisions driven by your conscience. Try to protect everybody from your shelter or sacrifice some of them for longer-term survival. During war, there are no good or bad decisions; there is only survival. The sooner you realize that, the better.

This War of Mine: Anniversary Edition
It's been two years since This War of Mine global release and we're still expanding the experience. This new free DLC, created especially for the Anniversary Edition, adds new characters, new locations to explore, and most importantly - a whole new ending, leading to a different outcome to the game. The dilemma though remains the same – how far will you go, to protect the ones you care about? 

Key Features:
• Inspired by real-life events 
• Control your survivors and manage your shelter 
• Craft weapons, alcohol, beds or stoves – anything that helps you survive 
• Make decisions - an often unforgiving and emotionally difficult experience 
• Randomized world and characters every time you start a new game 
• Charcoal-stylized aesthetics to complement the game's theme

This War of Mine experience is now broadened with "The Little Ones" expansion. "The Little Ones" explores the hardships of wartime survival as seen from an entirely new perspective―that of a child. This DLC puts you in charge of a group of adults and children stuck in a besieged city, struggling with basic necessities. TWoM: The Little Ones focuses not only on the reality of enduring war, but also on how even in times of conflict, kids are still kids: they laugh, cry, play, and see the world differently. In addition to thinking about survival, you'll have to summon your inner child to understand how to protect the little ones. Their youth, and their future, are in your hands.

• Experience the biggest expansion to This War of Mine
• Protect innocent children
• Craft toys, play with kids, and be the caretaker they need
• Meet new adult civilians in scenarios with children

PLEASE NOTE: This game is optimized for latest devices. While playing on older devices such as iPhone 4s or iPad 2 you might experience lower frame rates.

tw.description:
樑的撓度是一款功能強大且多功能的計算器，適用於梁、二維桁架和二維框架。介面簡單直觀，圖形輸出採用最先進技術。除了反應力、剪力、彎矩和撓度結果之外，樑的撓度還能計算梁截面和梁長度上的內部剪力和彎曲應力。

二維框架和桁架編輯器

二維編輯器與梁編輯器無縫整合。繪製任意框架和桁架結構，並使用與梁相同的簡單介面來應用荷載和約束。您可以直接在二維編輯器中視覺化結果，或選擇一個梁以獲得更多洞見。

內部應力

除了剪力、彎矩和撓度圖之外，還可以獲得內部彎曲應力和剪力的圖表。可以沿著梁的長度以及截面的垂直軸線可視化內部應力。

截面編輯器

編輯內置截面。轉動慣量和面積值會自動計算並應用於其餘的梁計算。

更多功能

• 內置數據庫包含更多參考數據，方便使用。
• 可選擇應用梁自重
• 無限設計文件
• 快速開始模板

聯繫

如有任何問題或評論，請發送電子郵件至contact@ketchep.com。

tw.description:
您想製作屬於自己的微電影嗎？
您想當導演、製片、主演……嗎？

在電影精靈中，這些角色可以全部由您一個人搞定！

通過電影精靈，您可以把各種媒體素材如視頻、照片、音樂、文字、錄音以及手指塗鴉等，按照您的創意，把它們編輯組合在一起，並給它們添加各種特效（場景切換特效、文字動畫、濾鏡特效、片頭、蒙版等），創作出屬於您自己的微電影。

-可裁剪、分割、合併、縮放各種媒體素材

-能把視頻／照片變黑白，把需要突出的部分還原色彩突出出來（Color Splash）
-能自由變形視頻／照片成不規則形狀
-給視頻／照片／文字添加運動點，使它們動起來，縮放、旋轉和移動結合起來可創建出各種各樣的絢麗效果
-實时預覽，高分辨視頻輸出
-可通過Wi-Fi直接從電腦導入多媒體素材：視頻、照片、音樂和Gif動畫等
-可直接保存並分享影片到社交網絡，如雲盤、微信、QQ、抖音等

如果您有任何問題或迴響，請直接發郵件到verytools2006@gmail.com，我們會儘快答覆您。謝謝！

tw.trackName: 鬼谷八荒 Tale of Immortal
tw.description:
《鬼谷八荒》是一款開放世界的沙盒修仙遊戲。結合了修仙體系與山海經文化背景，體驗從凡人一步步修行成長為強者的過程，與山海經中各種妖、獸戰鬥。你是否能堅守本心，與困難做鬥爭；慎做抉擇，把握自己的命運。
【遁入修仙世界，開啟逆天人生】  
鬼谷八荒，除了財侶法地，還有詭祕莫測的妖獸，危機重重的秘境，難以逾越的天塹，彩光四射的祕寶，等著被人發現。  
你將作為一個煉氣期小修士從愚村出發，修煉，變強，危機中九死一生。每一次突破，你都能逆天改命，助你在旅途上披荊斬棘，跨越五大州，睥睨天下，再闖上天元山，向天道一問。  

【AI互動生態，給NPC完整的一生】  
我們構建了完整的NPC互動生態，他們「生活」在這裡，有自己的朋友親族關係網，自己的人生軌跡，不受玩家的進度限制，除非，你決定出手干涉。  
你可兼濟天下，攜手紅顏；你可獨善其身，快意恩仇；你亦可逆天而行，與全世界為敵。  
和NPC們切磋武藝，傳授道心，拜師學藝，收徒授業。和NPC在拍賣場喊價廝殺，結束後拔刀相向或順手牽羊。你將成為修仙界群像中的一部分，是大放異彩，還是默默修行，皆看你如何選擇。  

【體驗小說橋段，感受奇遇驚喜】  
英雄救美？愛人為你爭風吃醋？五十年之約？捲入神秘組織的明爭暗鬥？遺蹟遇寶？又慘遭奪寶？  
這些都有可能發生在你身上。  
除NPC交互之外，這裡還有豐富的隨機事件以及支線任務，在你的旅途上給予驚喜。它們或許會讓你煩惱，餵你刀子，也可能讓你化險為夷，甚至破而後立。在一步又一步的選擇過程中，你將譜寫只屬於你的，獨一無二的故事。  

【打造最強宗門，攻城略地一統八荒】  
我們構建了宗門的經營玩法，身為弟子、長老以及宗主，將會有不同的體驗。你可以加入大宗門，從最底層的弟子做起，一步步爬上權力的階梯。也可以空降落魄的小宗門，力挽狂瀾，帶領宗門重振雄風。  
弟子可以完成宗門任務，在宗門大比中出戰，或隨同門出征作戰，為宗門積累資源，為宗門贏取榮譽，為宗門擴張土地。  
長老可以管轄門下弟子，傳道授業，分配任務職能，加速宗門成長，在宗門大戰中指導弟子大殺四方。  
宗主則需要統籌全宗的秩序，制定侵略和防守計劃，攻防靈礦等資源點，甚至佔領他人宗門，奪取專屬逆天改命和祕籍。  
一統八荒，只要你有宏圖壯志和鐵腕手段，不再只是幻想。  

【構築獨特流派，挑戰妖獸神仙】  
闖蕩這世界，需要有傍身之技。  
心法築根基，武技/靈技探深淺，身法創機會，絕技造優勢，神通定乾坤。不同祕籍有不同的特性。  
修仙者還有十二大靈根，對應不同的流派，你可以選擇專精一路，或全面發展。十二種靈根都有對應的功法祕籍，排列組合可組成豐富的流派，孰強孰弱，皆由你評斷。  
城鎮琅琊閣、宗門功法閣、秘境、各種任務，甚至路邊一個土坑裡，都可能發現珍奇祕籍，充滿驚喜。  
這個世界上還有上百種珍奇妖獸，無數修仙者、鬼怪、仙人供你檢驗自己的實力。挑戰升仙擂台，衝擊各大洲參玄榜，以此證明自己的實力。你能否踏破冥山的障礙一路向前？構築的流派能否經歷大浪淘沙的檢驗？  

【法寶器靈煉丹畫符，三大神器伴前路】  
練好自身本領，也別忘了外力加持。  
開局三大神器，每一個都會給你帶來一種獨一無二的系統。雙魚佩可以復活自己和選中之人，昊天眼可以偷學妖獸技能，洞察更多訊息，而煉妖壺則可以讓你捕獲BOSS成為你的小跟班，替你戰鬥或派遣尋求寶物。  
除了開局神器之外，你也能煉製你自己的法寶，並收服器靈與你一起戰鬥，此外器靈還會在探索中給予你陪伴，觸發專屬的奇遇等等。  
在這裡，你還可以學習煉丹畫符、堪輿風水，製作幫助你探索世界、整蠱仇人、戰鬥殺敵的種種道具。至於如何發揮它們真正的作用，皆看各位道友如何抉擇。

tw.description:
全球出貨＆下載超過100萬套的
《Trials of Mana》在智慧型手機上登場！

不論過去有沒有遊玩過《聖劍傳說》系列作品，都能夠盡情享受本作品帶來的樂趣。

◆故事
從前，世界仍處在被黑暗所壟罩的時代。瑪那女神以「瑪那之劍」打倒了將世界導向毀滅的8個災厄化身--「神獸」，並將其封印在8個要石之中。
就這樣，黑暗褪去，世界就此誕生了。

瑪那女神化身為大樹陷入了沉睡，並經過了漫長的歲月……
然而卻出現了一群人，企圖從8個要石之中，再度將神獸解放出來，以獲取超越神的力量，並藉此掌握世界。於是，世界上紛爭四起……和平的時代宣告終結……

與此同時，瑪那迅速地從這世上消失，瑪那之樹也開始枯萎衰弱……

◆主角
故事開始時可以從6名角色當中選擇3人。本作採用了獨特的「三線故事」設計。根據選擇的主角與夥伴不同，將會帶來不同的冒險旅程。

◆畫質
以全3D技術呈現出美麗的瑪那世界！ 過去令人懷念的場景與角色們將以漂亮的畫質重現。

◆戰鬥系統
戰鬥系統加入了跳躍、連段攻擊、閃避敵人攻擊等多樣化動作重新打造。本作依然保有《聖劍傳說》系列傳統的「環狀指令」，還另外新增了「快捷鍵指令」。

◆成長系統
「光」或「闇」--透過「轉職」讓角色的類型與外觀產生變化！ 本作新增了4階職業，還以超過300種的「技能」重新調整成長系統，讓養成變得更加自由。

◆難度設定
分為「非常簡單、簡單、普通、困難」4個階段。如果您不擅長動作遊戲，希望以享受劇情為主的話，推薦您選擇即使全滅也能原地復活的「非常簡單」。

◆全新的編曲
本作收錄了多達60首由作曲家菊田裕樹監修的全新編曲！ 也可將音樂切換至原版的音源遊玩。

◆角色語音
由豪華配音陣容帶來的語音體驗！ 隨著隊伍組合不同，冒險中的支線對話也會改變……

◆通關後要素
觀賞完結局後，將會觸發對應各主角的嶄新篇章。在通過嶄新篇章後，便可以「繼承過關資料開始新遊戲」，還能選擇挑戰「非常困難」與極度難以通關的「沒有未來」難度。

◆其他嶄新要素
新增了可以遊玩各主角故事開端的「序章體驗」，以及《聖劍傳說》系列中大家熟悉的「仙人掌小弟」探索，還大幅更新了「種子」的種類。另外，本遊戲也支援自動儲存功能。

◆智慧型手機版本的特徵
‧翻修為便於觸控使用的選單，能夠以虛擬面板操控角色。
‧新增自動鎖定目標、自動調整鏡頭、自動戰鬥等功能。
‧可以在選項中自行選擇喜歡的畫質。
‧支援雲端儲存。
‧能夠獲得兩件初始裝備，裝備時直到Lv17都會發揮特殊效果，它們分別是增加戰鬥所獲經驗值的「拉比兔飾品」，以及增加戰鬥所獲盧克的「絲尾拉比兔飾品」。

【應用程式大小】
‧本應用程式的大小約為6.7GB。購買前請先確認裝置可用的儲存空間。
‧啟動應用程式後，於通過最初的BOSS戰後將需要下載大量資料。也可以一開始就用標題畫面的「下載」全部下載。
‧強烈建議使用Wi-Fi下載。

【遊玩人數】
1人

us.description:
Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best.

ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE.
Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged.

FOR EVERY MUSICIAN.
Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads.

DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE.
AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space.

CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY.
AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there).


Highlighted Features:
- A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design.
- Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting).
- Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions).
- The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. 
- Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live.
- Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase.
- Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral.
- Concert pitch adjustment.


How to Use:
01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement.
02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes.
03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration.

Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

Play local music or stream from a file/media server with LMP. 

Apple TV version included, with support for Emby, Navidrome, Plex, and Jellyfin.

▣ Import via iTunes or folder and play local tracks

LMP was designed from scratch with offline music in mind. You can store music on your device in two forms: iTunes music or audio file. The first would require syncing with iTunes on Windows or Finder on Mac. To import as audio files, simply transfer them to the LMP Music folder on your device via any means. If you choose the latter, you will be able to enjoy additional features, such as editing of metadata via the LMP browser assistant.

▣ Connect to a cloud server and stream music from the server

If you have insufficient storage on your device, you can also store your tracks on a server and stream from the server. File servers using SMB and WebDAV are supported. However, we recommend hosting a media server instead, via Plex, Emby, Navidrome or Subsonic due to faster import speeds. All tracks come together seamlessly, no matter how they are imported, providing a unified experience. You can enable the option in the settings to hide repeated tracks across servers.

▣ Manage playlists with ease

LMP has its own playlist system that allows you to not only add tracks from all sources, but also artists. All tracks belonging to the artist would automatically be added to the playlist everytime you open the app or rescan, even newly added ones. With flexible artist splitting, you will be able to ensure that tracks get allocated to the right artist.

When the AI playlist is enabled, LMP will also be able to generate a playlist for you based on your listening preferences. Usage data is only recorded if this feature is enabled, and all data recorded for this is stored locally, so you do not have to worry about data privacy.

▣ Supports CarPlay & Siri

With support for CarPlay, you can start playing a playlist or control what's playing from your car's CarPlay console. Alternatively, you can also tell Siri to start playing a track or all tracks belonging to a particular artist, or use it to control the playback state of the current track.

▣ Support LRC lyrics

LMP supports both embedded lyrics and .lrc files. Use the LRC or Enhanced LRC format, and the app will be able to autoscroll lyrics as the music plays. If you do not have time to add your own lyrics, you can specify the lyrics API to use, and the app will attempt to fetch lyrics of any track that is playing.

▣ Browser Assistant

Manage local files on the app using the LMP browser assistant, which you can open on your computer's browser. Import new files or move/delete existing files using the Folders tool, edit music metadata using the Metadata tool or even manage your playlists using the playlists tool.

us.description:
Are you bored of the same old novels? Are you interested in interactive story games, visual novel, choice based storyline, and indie games, but you're tired of the same old? Try our Adventure Game, a Mysterious Novel where choices do matter! We are offering our interactive storytelling game named ‘7Days: Mystery Visual Novel, Adventure Game’. All our stories, mysterious novels are written by diligently selected authors.

Here we come a story game, filled with mystery, touching, innocent episodes, storyline and chat stories!

'7Days!: Mystery Visual Novel, Adventure Game' is an amazing mystery story game and choice based game. It is a unique choice based, storytelling game where the user can create their unique story based on the choices they make.

We will provide the best story game experience with a great mystery storyline via the chat based adventure game, designed to suit mobile devices. It is a strongly recommended game for you.

■ Game explained
Every choice you make will change your story.
Every small choice will change your relationships with comrades,
and change your fate and those of your comrades at critical moments.

You may be the villain, or a trustworthy comrade.
Everything depends on your choices.

■ Mystery Storyline
There are dead spirits who have been put to test for resurrection in the world of death.
The messenger of death has assigned them each with a task and they must either attack one another or work together. Your character, Kirell, must also complete the choice-based tasks that she has been assigned.
But her tasks requires others to die....

You only have 7 days

Experience this imagination-provoking story right now.

■ '7Days: Mystery Visual Novel, Adventure Game' features

■ We guarantee that it'll be fun. Download and experience it right now

We bring new adventure game storyline! Now, you have the opportunity to enjoy our Thriller, Mystery Story Adventure Games!

If you see any issues or have good suggestions, please send them to help@buffstudio.com. We will work hard make better Choice based story games, Mystery storytelling, Indie games, Thriller storyline, Adventure games, Choice based game.

■ We need your support to make better story games, adventure games, visual novel games. Please recommend this storytelling game to your family and friends. It will be of great help to us.

us.description:
"If you've not already played this brilliant, heart-wrenching game, then mobile is as good a place as any to let it completely destroy you." - , 9/10, Pocket Gamer UK

"This War of Mine isn’t exactly “fun,” but it’s definitely a game worth playing." , 9/10, 148apps

"I'm really excited to go home and download 11 bit studios' title on my iPad" , Game Informer

In This War Of Mine you do not play as an elite soldier, rather a group of civilians trying to survive in a besieged city; struggling with lack of food, medicine and constant danger from snipers and hostile scavengers. The game provides an experience of war seen from an entirely new angle. 

The pace of This War of Mine is imposed by the day and night cycle. During the day snipers outside stop you from leaving your refuge, so you need to focus on maintaining your hideout: crafting, trading and taking care of your survivors. At night, take one of your civilians on a mission to scavenge through a set of unique locations for items that will help you stay alive. 

Make life-and-death decisions driven by your conscience. Try to protect everybody from your shelter or sacrifice some of them for longer-term survival. During war, there are no good or bad decisions; there is only survival. The sooner you realize that, the better.

This War of Mine: Anniversary Edition
It's been two years since This War of Mine global release and we're still expanding the experience. This new free DLC, created especially for the Anniversary Edition, adds new characters, new locations to explore, and most importantly - a whole new ending, leading to a different outcome to the game. The dilemma though remains the same – how far will you go, to protect the ones you care about? 

Key Features:
• Inspired by real-life events 
• Control your survivors and manage your shelter 
• Craft weapons, alcohol, beds or stoves – anything that helps you survive 
• Make decisions - an often unforgiving and emotionally difficult experience 
• Randomized world and characters every time you start a new game 
• Charcoal-stylized aesthetics to complement the game's theme

This War of Mine experience is now broadened with "The Little Ones" expansion. "The Little Ones" explores the hardships of wartime survival as seen from an entirely new perspective―that of a child. This DLC puts you in charge of a group of adults and children stuck in a besieged city, struggling with basic necessities. TWoM: The Little Ones focuses not only on the reality of enduring war, but also on how even in times of conflict, kids are still kids: they laugh, cry, play, and see the world differently. In addition to thinking about survival, you'll have to summon your inner child to understand how to protect the little ones. Their youth, and their future, are in your hands.

• Experience the biggest expansion to This War of Mine
• Protect innocent children
• Craft toys, play with kids, and be the caretaker they need
• Meet new adult civilians in scenarios with children

PLEASE NOTE: This game is optimized for latest devices. While playing on older devices such as iPhone 4s or iPad 2 you might experience lower frame rates.

advisories: Unrestricted Web Access
us.description:
Anonymity guaranteed - no registration

There is no connection to a telephone number and no collection of user identification data. The TeleGuard-ID is your very personal identification number that you need in order to connect with your friends. Every TeleGuard user receives an ID number and a QR code, which can be sent out to get in touch with others. 


Designed to be the most secure messenger in the world

TeleGuard's focus is on protecting privacy and confidential communication. TeleGuard is the secure messenger from Swisscows. Swisscows has set itself the task of protecting its users from data misuse in every situation. As the smartphone is the most widely used medium in the world nowadays, a secure messenger is indispensable.

Highly secure and modern server

All servers are located in the data centers in Switzerland. A complex encryption system is used for all transmitted data and absolutely no user data is stored on the servers. Everything is absolutely anonymous.

That's why TeleGuard is better than the others

TeleGuard encrypts every message and voice call with the one of the best encryption algorithm currently available: SALSA 20. Since our servers are in Switzerland, we are not subject to the data protection laws of the EU / USA and do not have to pass on any data.

How is my privacy secured?

HTTPS, end-to-end encryption, deletion of messages from the server after reading. No user data, neither IP address nor other, is recorded or stored.

Functions

•	Send text and voice messages
•	Share pictures and videos
•	Video and voice telephony
•	Send files
•	Create groups
•	The identity of contacts can be verified by scanning the QR code.

Support

If you have further questions, you will find our FAQs here: teleguard.com/en#faq

us.description:
Feeling overwhelmed by the chaos of life? Find your peace and vitality with BreatheIn, the app that helps you unlock the power of mindful breathing.

Rediscover Calm and Energy

Deep, mindful breathing is the key to a calm mind and a vibrant body. With BreatheIn, immerse yourself in guided exercises that harmonize your body and mind, leading to true balance and renewal.

Expertly Curated Practices

We've handpicked and tested each exercise to ensure you get the best. Start your journey toward a healthier, more fulfilled life today!

Seamless Apple Health Integration

Track your progress effortlessly—BreatheIn automatically syncs with Apple Health, making it easy to monitor your wellness journey.

Explore a Range of Techniques

- Square Breathing (4-4-4-4): Regain control and calm your mind.
- Relax Breathing (4-7-8): Beat anxiety and fall asleep faster.
- Bee Breathing: Soothe your mind with this relaxing technique.
